resources.string: As soon as you find an apartment the owner will provide you with a document to register yourself to the address you are staying at. City Registration is Legal Proof that you are living at a given address. This document is required further for any documentation e.g. Block Account in Bank, Student Pass, Job, etc. This document is called Anmeldungsbescheinigung in German.

string.name: city_button
string.b: Press the button below to find a registration office near to you and make an appointment at the Registration Office (Bürgeramt).

resources.string: If Travel Pass is not provided by your university then you can get it done yourself. You can visit any nearby BVG or VBB office for getting a yearly student pass done.

string.name: pass_button
string.b: This procedure can also be done online from the BVG link below.

resources.string: A Block account is an amount that needs to be blocked while arriving on a student visa in Germany. It is for covering your 1-year living expenses. It is one of the visa application requirements. You can find further details about this while preparing for the visa application.

Block account is processed through the bank after landing here in Germany. It will take mostly a week time or so. You need to visit the nearest Deutsch bank branch with documents like passport address proof and university matriculation letter. Meet at the information counter and ask for the procedure. They open an account for you and then the money has to be transferred. The procedure takes about a week or two and can be done only after you have your address proof done i.e City Registration.
Health insurance is one of the documents which is required for any official work in Germany therefore everyone has to get insurance done.
There are two types of Insurance private and public. Public insurance is much preferred once and covers almost all the basic health problems with good service.
Private insurance is a cheaper one but also the facilities provided are less.

Finding a place to stay is the first task while shifting to any new place. Some universities provide accommodation facilities in student apartments but this option is not available for all universities. Therefore before beginning your search first consult your university about it.

After all the documentation (City Registration, Block Account, etc.) is done it is a great idea to improve the language skills. It is a job requirement in most of the companies, therefore it is very important to know the language properly. Here are some affordable and good language courses that can be done along with the university lectures with flexible days and timing options.

Most people receive a visa for 6 months only while coming to Germany and have to extend it further after coming here. The procedure for this is to make an appointment at the visa office (Auslanderbehörder) at least 4 weeks before visa expiry and go for the appointment with all the specified documents and get the visa extended.
